details.description: Disability benefits claims for people outside the UK - moving, working, retired to the EEA or Switzerland
details.alternative_title: Contact information for the Exportability team
details.body:
The exportability team decides on benefit claims for people living in an European Economic Area (EEA) country or Switzerland.

Exportability team

exportability.team@dwp.gsi.gov.uk

Exportability Co-ordinator
Room RB201
Pension, Disability and Carers Service
Warbreck House
Warbreck Hill Road
FY2 0YE

They examine claims for:

  • the care component of Disability Living Allowance
  • Attendance Allowance
  • Carerâ€™s Allowance

details.description: Includes calculating State Pension, eligibility, claiming and deferring
Includes holidays and finding a job

related.title: Tax credits if you are moving country or travelling

details.description: Tax credits if your family lives abroad, you're going abroad temporarily, you live outside the UK, you're a cross-border worker or subject to immigration control
What you need to know if you move or retire abroad - tax, pensions, voting and contacting your local council
